action.text: Joel Maligalig assigned to Joel Maligalig

full_threads.body:
Hi Guys,

Are you guys able to add a new custom text field to the property post type and render it out on page in the position attached?

I believe the build uses Option Tree for the other custom fields on this post type.

If the field is left blank then the block should not render.

Let me know if you have any questions 😀



Kind Regards,
Jamie Shek
Director, Creative Generals

// mobile 0423 592 912
// email jamie@creativegenerals.com.au
// web creativegenerals.com.au
// linkedin creative-generals

Begin forwarded message:

From: Linda Kadel <linda.kadel@visitlatitude25.com.au>
Subject: WordPress Help
Date: 24 March 2020 at 6:15:54 pm AEDT
To: Jamie Shek | Creative Generals <jamie@creativegenerals.com.au>

Hey Jamie,

Can you please help me…
I am wanting to put a blurb about each home on the website on the different lots, however I'm not sure where in Wordpress I need to put the text so that it is shown in the box in the image below.
I was going to ask you to do all of these for me, however I will need to change as we go along, as each stage they get changed so I would prefer to know where to go.

I tried to put it in a few times, but kept showing the text down the bottom, so thought I better ask the expert before I touch something I shouldn't!!

Thanks in advance.
